table.name: vtiger_listcountry
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listcountry` ( `listcountryid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `country_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `popular` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `visa` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listcountryid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_listcountrycf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listcountrycf` ( `listcountryid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listcountryid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
